  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="21548" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="21548" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.43</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="4756">4,756</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="677"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Oajan</b> by <b>Parfums de Marly</b> is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. <b>Oajan</b> was launched in 2013. Top notes are Cinnamon, Honey and Osmanthus; middle notes are Benzoin, Ambergris, Labdanum and Artemisia; base notes are Vanila, Tonka Bean, Patchouli and Musk. </p><p class="reviewstrigger"                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">226</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Painfully sweet and cloying
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    </div>
                    Weak longevity and sillage for the price

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="21548"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.65.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cinnamon-65.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cinnamon</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.181.jpg" style="width: 4.75rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Honey-181.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Honey</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.8404579286951; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.10.jpg" style="width: 2.975rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Osmanthus-10.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Osmanthus</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.93475271741739; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.69.jpg" style="width: 3.525rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Benzoin-69.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Benzoin</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.524.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ambergris-524.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ambergris</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81007176538254; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.15.jpg" style="width: 2.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Labdanum-15.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Labdanum</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.47.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Artemisia-47.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Artemisia</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.99049106974986; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 3.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanila</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.99049106974986; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.73.jpg" style="width: 3.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tonka-Bean-73.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tonka Bean</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.78843493436923; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.34.jpg" style="width: 2.725rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Patchouli-34.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Patchouli</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.78283876109963; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 2.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div></div>

</div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="strike-title"><span><small>Collections</small> Arabian Breed </span></div><div class="carousel"><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Habdan-21550.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.21550.jpg"alt="Habdan Parfums de Marly" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Parfums de Marly</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Habdan</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Kuhuyan-21549.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.21549.jpg"alt="Kuhuyan Parfums de Marly" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Parfums de Marly</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Kuhuyan</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Hamdani-21551.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.21551.jpg"alt="Hamdani Parfums de Marly" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Parfums de Marly</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Hamdani</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><gender-widget :perfume_id="21548"></gender-widget></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><price-value-widget :perfume_id="21548"></price-value-widget></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><similar-perfumes :perfume_id="21548" title="This perfume reminds me of"><div class="strike-title">
  <span>
    This perfume reminds me of
  </span>
</div>
<div class="carousel">
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.2669.jpg" alt="Hermessence Ambre Narguile Herms">
                <span class="brand">Herms</span>
                <br>Hermessence Ambre Narguile
            </a>
        </div>
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.62615.jpg" alt="Angels' Share By Kilian">
                <span class="brand">By Kilian</span>
                <br>Angels' Share
            </a>
        </div>
            <div class="carousel-cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2369998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nichespectator0696"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857853"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nichespectator0696" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1857853">nichespectator0696</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind buy for me after reading copious amounts of reviews. Tried it on skin tonight after I received it and I must say that Im surprised by just how much I actually like it. This is quite an enjoyable fragrance! <br />
<br />
However, Im not sure if its just my nose, but it appears to have faded away after only about 3 hours. Maybe I under-applied? I used 5 sprays, which is a lot for me (I really dont like being the guy whose fragrance occupies all of the empty space in the room when I walk in), so to have it become a skin scent after this short amount of time leaves me a bit underwhelmed. I guess this means Herod has yet to be dethroned as my favorite from this house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2369998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2369998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366221" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bel.gravia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1072859"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1072859.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bel.gravia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Poeme-171.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.171.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poeme"title="Poeme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1072859">bel.gravia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 12:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very much Hermes Ambre Narguile and Kilian Angel Share  a Christmas cinnamon pie  </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2366221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2366221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It brought back memories from my time in Guatemala, having mosh guatemalteco (Guatemalan oatmeal) with breakfast. For me, scent evokes memories, both positive and negative, and this one brings back some of the best. For those who say this smells nothing like oatmeal, I am sorry that you never had the luxury of smelling and tasting the sweet watery oatmeal concoction with milk, honey, and cinnamon that is mosh guatemalteco, but I hope that one day you do.and when you do, you will instantly think of this scent. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2339163"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2339163#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2337344" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="V8 Penguin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2067528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2067528.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="V8 Penguin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2337344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2337344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2067528">V8 Penguin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 22:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds of me of a sexy cinnamon roll.<br />
9.5/10 - would be a 10 if the opening lasted a bit longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2337344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2337344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335878" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sniffing Jin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2292211.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sniffing Jin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292211">Sniffing Jin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 13:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet cinnamon bomb, with hint of something medicinal. <br />
<br />
If you love cinnamon, there is a good chance you will like this. I have heard many times it smells like an apple pie, which I can definitely see, but for some reason Oajan does not give me gourmand qualities which is likely due to the labdanum and patchouli.  <br />
<br />
Sorta less zingy version of Killian Angel Share?<br />
<br />
Very loud fragrance, gets me 8-9 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2335878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2335878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335831" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335831" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Socialbat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2276009"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2276009.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Socialbat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335831ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335831" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2276009">Socialbat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>PDM Oajan<br />
<br />
I dont love it.  I like it though. On the opening I can immediately pick up the cinnamon and honey as it dries down. On the dry down, it fades out quite a bit, almost entirely disappearing on my skin (I could have went nose blind as well). I also recognize the patchouli, which I dont always love.<br />
Overall, Ill rate it a 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2335831"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2335831#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335590" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 09:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first tested Oajan, I thought that while it smelled decent I didn't get too much apple pie from it and it smelled a bit too middle-eastern which I'm not too crazy about in a fragrance. With the sample I have having a chance to sit and mature, the scent smells very much like the apple pie that many people have described and lot less of the middle-eastern notes. I get a lot of cinnamon and honey without it being overwhelming. If I had to nitpick, the scent has a light sourness to it from the benzoin, tonka bean and/or patchouli but it's very tolerable. This is a good fall/winter scent and it's stunning if you like the smell of apple pie. Oajan is an 9.5/10, amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2335590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2335590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333855" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333855" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sharuko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2060081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2060081.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sharuko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333855ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333855" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2060081">Sharuko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 15:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to like it, but I dont.  The opening smells good but then it gets way to powdery on my skin.  That powdery smell takes over all other elements and removes the unique notes that it seems to have.<br />
<br />
Thankfully I just bought a sample, might also test out Angels Share.  Pass for now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2333855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2333855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327569" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smellsgood29"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143954"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="smellsgood29" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143954">smellsgood29</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 15:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first thing this makes me think of is an oatmeal raisin cookie. Doesn't read as a basic bitch teen girl cookie scent, though (don't come for me--I was that girl!)--it's a little more grown up. I understand the apple pie comparison because it's a similar blend of spices, but there's no tartness to make me think of apple. It's beautiful, but it's the kind of photorealistic gourmand that ruins my appetite because the scent interferes with what I expect to taste. I'd wear it for a cozy day around the house, or a cute fall date. I do lose the scent on me after an hour or two, but maybe the longevity would be better with a spray application than with the luckyscent dabbers. Too expensive for me to go for a full bottle, but if you're searching for the perfect cozy cinnamony gourmand I could see this being "the one" for someone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2327569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2327569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325648" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2325648"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2325648#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324649" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324649" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="justloveyourselfforever"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="justloveyourselfforever" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Beach-Hut-Man-46336.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46336.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beach Hut Man"title="Beach Hut Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324649ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324649" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928702">justloveyourselfforever</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 03:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very well blended cinammon with vanilla + honey. It shares the same vibe with tobacco frags, like chergui, tobacolor. Its spicy, sweet and dense, really wam. Its obviously crowd-pleased, everyone will love it. Recommend it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2324649"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2324649#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Y'all are some goofballs. People are allowed to own more than one sweet fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2322066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2322066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you like cinnamon, you'll like this.<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2321160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2321160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318391" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318391" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cate1312"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1521631.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cate1312" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318391ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318391" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316702" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wee keavo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2114814.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wee keavo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316702ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316702" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814">Wee keavo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it but angels share is better. Not much I can say about this honestly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2316702"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2316702#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316472" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JuliaToothFairy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JuliaToothFairy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472">JuliaToothFairy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 09:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oajan is a waterfall of propolis, not honey.<br />
I can smell a little bit of vanilla and a little bit of cinnamon, but these are definitely not the most forward notes. <br />
It also smells like benzoin, olibanum.<br />
Together, the propolis and benzoin form a very boozy, alcoholic scent together. <br />
Overall it smells 80% like propolis and 20% like benzoin.<br />
A beautiful perfume for someone who is drown to this type of scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2316472"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2316472#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313659" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2313659" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Om3r_perfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2140989.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Om3r_perfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-Cedar-64560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti Cedar"title="Halfeti Cedar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2313659ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2313659" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140989">Om3r_perfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 16:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oajan is an excellent blend of cinnamon and honey off the top. Its very prominent gourmand scent makes it an extremely well complimented winter and fall fragrance. Off the base notes this scent becomes more sweeter with the tonka bean note and the slightly weaker vanilla note. But for most of its longevity the main note that will be smelled is the cinnamon and honey combo.<br />
<br />
Oajan lasts forever! I sprayed this on my jacket 24 hours ago and its still smelling quiet strongly. The projection aswell is excellent. Sprayed this and it filled majority of the room. And Oajan is a MASSIVE compliment getter. I have gotten an insane amount of compliments in the short time Ive owned this. I think this fragrance is a perfect date night scent and perfect for any form of night outtings. This is easily a top 3 De Marley scent tied with Haltane and Althair in my personal opinion. <br />
<br />
For those who say this is close to angel share, they are not wrong. But at the same time this was produced 6-7 years before Angel Share. I still think if you have one dont bother getting the other. Oajan is also priced high like other De Marley scents, but you still do get 125ml so for what you are getting I still think its decently priced. <br />
<br />
Scent: 10<br />
Longevity: 10<br />
Projection: 10<br />
Value: 8<br />
Overall: 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2313659"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2313659#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312470" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="preppyone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/832287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.832287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="preppyone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Amore-Caffe-87409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amore Caff"title="Amore Caff"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312470ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312470" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/832287">preppyone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p> Absolutely a masterpiece, and so niche.  Great value for your money. Performance is  <br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2312470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2312470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2310950" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310950" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MDSTR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2276164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MDSTR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310950ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310950" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2276164">MDSTR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 05:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells heavily of cinnamon at first with a strong projection. however, after barely an hour when it dries down the cinnamon disappears and it becomes a very sweet smell but the projection becomes VERY weak.<br />
<br />
compared to althair it smells a bit more manly and i like the opening more but the dry down on althair 1. projects better. 2. lasts much longer. 3. smells better. <br />
<br />
to try i put 1 spray of each on each of my forearms and after 1 hour my gf could barely smell the oajan but althair remained strong. if you put 5 sprays of oajan you will still only smell good for about 2-3 hours, before the scent is almost gone. but the opening smells very good.<br />
<br />
i know people like to compare these two and if you are considering buying either i recommend buying a sample of both. if you are blind buying then i would go with althair just because the scent lasts much longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2310950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2310950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309146" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309146" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrMrBrian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1949338"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1949338.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrMrBrian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Profumum-Roma/Sorriso-21853.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21853.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sorriso"title="Sorriso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309146ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309146" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1949338">MrMrBrian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 13:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First of all I like this &amp; I own it. Secondly looking at the list of other fragrances it smells like Ill do some upsetting here prob when I say Its very similar to other ones I have purchased like Amen Pure Tonka, Atelier Des Ors Rouge Saray &amp; Yes, Xerjoffs Iommi Monkey All have the dominant note of Tonka &amp; the small   spins &amp; tweaks on them isnt really enough to make me feel like its enough. I have Montales Arabian Tonka &amp; just gotton to the point of me telling myself keep on throwing your money away dude!! Now as for the one up for review? Oajan I dont see it as any lesser nor any better than the others brought up. They all have small things that separate them making em all solid fragrances other than price per ml with the Monkey Special being its a 50 ml, But perhaps that one probably being my slight fav out of the before mentioned. Id love to buy Angels Share, But fear it wont veer away enough from these others in my stash! Nevertheless the common denominator here seems to be TONKA</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2309146"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2309146#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Perfectly Unisex with yummy cinnamon, spice and possibly some fruit thrown in. This reminds me of a spicier Ambre Eccentrico by Armani (which I believe is discontinued). I'm looking forward to wearing this around the holidays and spritzing some on my bf too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2307991"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2307991#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273657">SOScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 03:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A more recent purchase of mine and I can only describe this fragrance and a hot apple pie with cinnamon custard on top . This scream Christmas for me and I think Ill only ever wear it over the Christmas period! <br />
<br />
Opening is a little overpowering but once it dries down it becomes very sweet, sexy, almost inviting and just comforting one to wear. <br />
<br />
This is defo a date night fragrances as I believe it could be a bit much for a casual daily wear! Performvae is also very very good with it lasting a solid 8hrs and it projecting for around 3/4hrs <br />
<br />
8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2304372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2304372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; LOL.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2301563"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2301563#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301398" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nadialucia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405251"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nadialucia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1405251">nadialucia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very overpriced, overhyped imitation of Ambre Narguile, in the ,,apple pie" category.And while I dont know the american apple pie, I know the apple pie my grandma used to bake,although not at Christmas, and this scents smell a lot like it because she too used a lot of cinnamon.They are of course not similar because Ambre Narguile is much more smooth and refined, the ,,apple pie" is not so prominent, it is not so heavy on cinnamon but airier.I wore Oajan last winter around Christmas for two weeks and just couldn`t get into it.I also had Boucherons Ambre DAlexandrie and this one is really a very good dupe for Oajan,I tested them at the same time. I would say that I would recommend the dupe, the price is a fraction from the OGs with very good longevity and sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2301398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2301398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2298953" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heliotrope72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heliotrope72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-20139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk"title="Choco Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2298953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2298953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661">Heliotrope72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 08:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p> MBTI  ENFP   Playful, vibrant, and warm.<br />
 Character Holly Golightly   Charming, festive, a touch flirty.<br />
 Wear Style: Holiday cocktail party   Perfect for anyone who loves a juicy, spiced cherry scent.<br />
<br />
 This scent is a festive delighta richer, more spirited take on Lost Cherry.* It opens like a sparkling cherry juice with a dash of cinnamon, absolutely delicious and easily one of PdM's best.<br />
<br />
The cherry note brings me back to fermenting cherries and grapes in a cauldron, creating a refreshing, slightly boozy drink thats fruity, zesty, and warming. Add a cinnamon stick, and its just right. <br />
<br />
With its main notes of cherry and cinnamon, this fragrance feels like a livelier take on Angels Sharea similar sweetness and spice but with a more sour, berry-like juiciness. Its also less boozy, which makes it easier to wear.<br />
<br />
If you love cherry juice, baked apples, and a holiday vibe, I cant recommend this one enough! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2298953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2298953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298894" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; on first spray I was so disappointed! Whilst I loved the smell,it was gone so quickly that I couldn't understand all the hype. Fast forward a couple of months &amp; I went back to it &amp; whether it's macerated or just the colder days but it's like a different scent! I get cinnamon spice laced with Honey &amp; I'm very tempted to go full bottle but I have my heart set on a bottle from another perfumer &amp; I don't "need" to spend over 200 twice! If I really had to think of something close to it my 2 choices would be Italica (although not as Gourmand)&amp; Black Phantom without the booze.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2291904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Carson22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1990728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Carson22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2291904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2291904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1990728">Carson22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 18:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance deserves all the hype, and don't let the notes fool you, I expected a super sweet fragrance when I bought this, almost like a JPG Scandal Pour Homme with cinnamon. But I was pleasantly surprised with a unbelievably smooth and great cinnamon with a touch of honey. It doesn't even smell like a cologne, and if you were to spray this inside a home, people would think you are cooking a thanksgiving desert. Definitely a great cologne, and it is pretty hard to think where you would wear it out in public, but I believe a date night, party, get together or even just like a little hangout could work with this fragrance, as it is fairly loud, but not overwhelming. I would say it is a 9.3/10 fragrance!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2291904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2291904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282800" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UrbanBliss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2180967.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UrbanBliss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282800ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282800" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180967">UrbanBliss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 12:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Omg, love at first sniff. Ive been searching the planet for a toned down Angel Share but not as sweet as Khamra. This is it. I can have my boozy fragrance and take it to the office too. Thank you PDM this is a solid 10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2282800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2282800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
