padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041784">Milano.jpeg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 05:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A masterpiece from parfums de marly, spicy, honey, warm cinnamon and vanilla in one perfume, its like chirstmas but in a bottle, at first you might smells some like vegemite or a balsam but on the middle an drydown you smells so sweet and sexy, performance and longevity is beast, but i recommend to buy some sample or just sniff it out on the pdm booth, because everyone dont like oajan just like my mom, its still a great fragrance tho, even tho i prefer altahir</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2282367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2282367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281046" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281046" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dokei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dokei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Journey-Man-25251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Journey Man"title="Journey Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281046ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281046" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656862">dokei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 22:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After owning it for about a year, i would say that i like it but its just meh<br />
<br />
It is safe and likeable, it lasts a reasonable amount and it comes off relaxed. Its a daily beater for the colder times. <br />
It doesnt radiate too much and that makes it so you can spray it without it being overpowering. Its not too sweet so it is professional, but it is somewhat interesting to wear it going out. <br />
<br />
These are decisions made on purpose so that the perfume isnt challenging. <br />
<br />
But these have removed the wow factor from the perfume. What could have been a very deep boozy scent is now a generic safe scent. That would be perfectly fine if the cost per bottle wasnt 220+...<br />
<br />
Its just a case of good at everything but master of none. I just dont reach for it that often. If i need something professional ill go french lover or something better for office. If i need something for going out ill go something more memorable. So this just falls off and for its price you dont want it to do that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2281046"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2281046#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270340" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fountain30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521681"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fountain30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270340ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270340" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521681">Fountain30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 12:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its basically Angels Share with a gourmand twist. Less booze but still had a slightly boozy quality with the honey and cinnamon combo. Its nice, PDM is quite a safe house considering its niche. Most of their offerings, particularly the masculine leaning ones are well, quite boring. This is more interesting and would be great during winter and especially Christmas time. Performance is good. Nuclear? No, but good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2270340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2270340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267454" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kid_Buu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1963669.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kid_Buu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Paragon-76580.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76580.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paragon"title="Paragon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963669">Kid_Buu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 16:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cinnamon apple pie in a bottle. You'll smell like an absolute snack while wearing this. Perfect for the fall and winter time.<br />
<br />
Do keep in mind that it is VERY similar to Angel's Share, to the point that owning both would be redundant. This is a bit spicier, while Angel's Share is more sweet and smooth. I'd just sample them and pick your favorite of the two.. For me I actually enjoy Oajan quite a bit more.<br />
<br />
The longevity and projection aren't insane, but I get a solid 7-ish hours out of it.<br />
<br />
Strong 8, maybe 9/10 for me. I look forward to busting this out whenever it starts to get chilly outside.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2267454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2267454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267163" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267163" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="V4LKYR3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2188915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2188915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="V4LKYR3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Satin-Mood-Extrait-de-parfum-48463.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48463.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Satin Mood Extrait de parfum"title="Oud Satin Mood Extrait de parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267163ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267163" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2188915">V4LKYR3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is very similar to Angels Share, if you own either or I dont recommend getting both. On that note Oajan is an absolute banger. <br />
<br />
Sweet, vanilla, apple pie is right. Thats the best way to explain it. If you want to start your Fall / Winter with a scent this is it. <br />
<br />
I will this though, if you think this is too sweet and feminine, I highly recommend looking into PDM Carlisle / Althair.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2267163"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2267163#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266767" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RifleZz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992810"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1992810.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RifleZz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oajan"title="Oajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266767ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266767" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992810">RifleZz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 04:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oajan is my baby.<br />
It got me into niche scents as it was my first FB of a niche scent.<br />
I've tried both the old and the new batch, they smell the same, performace (projection) might be slightly better on the old batch but it could also be due to the manceration of the juice in the old batch and not enough manceration in the new juice.<br />
Oajan is my first and my 100th review on this site, what a journey!<br />
I will always have a FB of Oajan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2266767"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2266767#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260587" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260587" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fragking2504"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fragking2504" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Apple-Brandy-on-the-Rocks-68326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Apple Brandy on the Rocks"title="Apple Brandy on the Rocks"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260587ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260587" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907719">fragking2504</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now I can't talk about any rumours of reformulation or old batches all I have is the batch I purchased yesterday but this fragrance is absolutely gorgeous. If you want a more masculine less cloying version of angels share by kilian this is it. Imagine angels share that's more spicy and ambery with less woods and booze. This is absolutely gorgeous in the opening you get loads of cinnamon and honey then it dries down to a beautiful apple pie scented amber that is amazing. also this is one of those gourmand fragrances that smells masculine like there is no doubt this is a men's fragrance unlike angels share where its more feminine. The performance is nuclear but it's strong were talking 5 sprays 8 to 10 hours with beautiful wafts all day long and incredible sillage the first two hours then it slowly turns into a skin scent by the 6th hour. People misjudge the performance on this as it's easy to go nose blind but I have to give this frag a 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2260587"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2260587#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259148" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethanrrs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2181530"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2181530.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethanrrs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259148ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259148" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2181530">ethanrrs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 01:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>when i was a kid i had a random air freshener or something similar, maybe it was actually a genuine perfume that was in my house, that was marketed as smelling like freshly baked cookies. lots of artificial smelling bath and bodyworks vanilla with some holiday spices. <br />
<br />
this feels like a more serious interpretation of that. so i have a lot of nostalgia for it. i want to search around more for a cinnamon-spiced vanilla holiday season frag though, i think this won't be the best i can find. BUT a really solid one at least for that purpose</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2259148"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2259148#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257237" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saveria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1847747.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saveria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Casmir-348.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.348.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Casmir"title="Casmir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257237ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257237" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747">Saveria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 07:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oajan is the favourite of my recent tests; it is sublime.<br />
<br />
At first spray, it's a whiff of very almondy tonka, quickly overtaken by honeyed cinnamon. It then becomes a bit "liquorous", coated with vanilla and benzoin. It's magnificent, it's love at first sniff.<br />
<br />
Oajan is everything I hoped for from Ambre Narguil which is not powerful enough for me. This one is perfect; all the notes intertwine perfectly and its final scent is intoxicating, enveloping and imposing. Coming across a perfume like this is simply delicious.<br />
<br />
Only problem; its price. 265 for a perfume is way too much for me.<br />
<br />
He who begins to love must prepare to suffer Antoine Gombaud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2257237"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2257237#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250703" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like it very much but for me its way more sour apple-cherry than anything else :/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2248196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2248196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247228" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2247228"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2247228#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243790" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243790" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AndySmellsGreat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1141379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AndySmellsGreat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Apex-72723.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72723.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Apex"title="Apex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243790ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243790" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141379">AndySmellsGreat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>People read reviews and decide that thats what it reminds them of.<br />
<br />
Oatmeal??? Ummm no<br />
<br />
Only at a generous distant discretion maybe<br />
<br />
It smells of darkened sweet jammy cinnamon with some kick. Bodied out and kept smooth by the patch and whilst quite sweet its kept a little fresh by the artemisia. If anything was comparable I would think it was a cherry scent, a little boozy with a touch of rose without reading the note list.<br />
<br />
Very smooth - a lot like Rhum etc Tabac by Comptoir Sud Pacifique where the cinnamon is syrupy and well blended.<br />
<br />
Very impressive - Id buy this over both Lost Cherry and Rhum et Tabac but I have both already.<br />
<br />
Oatmeal lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2243790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2243790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241807" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Creamy_ambrette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640057"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640057.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Creamy_ambrette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanille-Fatale-48029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Fatale"title="Vanille Fatale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640057">Creamy_ambrette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love how creamy and rich Oajan is. It definitely  has a oat accord that smelled like warm cinnamon oatmeal but it also has a custard like vanilla. Oajan is completely opaque while Angels Share is a crystalline. I dont get boozy with Oajan like I do with Angels Share. Oajans performance is above average. Its still on my skin 18 hours later- (I wore it to bed slept and its now 1pm and its a skin scent but its obviously there) its projects, creating a wonderful scent bubble for 5/6 hours. Im not waiting for my decant to run out, Im buying a FB</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2241807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2241807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073182">rev0lut10n</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 05:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very intense opening - marzipan &amp; booze for a few moments, settling down to an interesting cinnamon, honeyed-oats combination quite quickly. I understand the comparisons to porridge and dried apple. It's weirdly addictive to sniff.<br />
<br />
Nicely blended, but because I can't think of many situations I'd wear it in and given the price tag I'll give it an:<br />
<br />
8.25/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2241566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2241566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235415" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Porobear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874308"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874308.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Porobear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Parfum-49912.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49912.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874308">Porobear</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-01">08/01/24 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A cinnamon spiced apple pie bomb. I see a lot of people saying it smells like rum or cognac, and I can sort of see why, but it's not actually booze. I liken this to By Killian's Angel Share, but less cloyingly sweet and more spiced up, without the Hennessy cognac note in it.<br />
<br />
9/10. It's absolutely lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2235415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2235415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Scent is very elegant and rich.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2233539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2233539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230634" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sinkagu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945767"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1945767.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sinkagu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945767">Sinkagu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 22:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont have my sample of 1 million prive anymore but I have a clone called Milano Prive and my family all thought that Oajan and Milano Prive Dry downs smelled very similar +90%. For context did a smell test with Kismet Angel, Milano Prive and Oajan!<br />
 Oajan starts out Boozy and Spicey, and over time it gets more gourmand with the cinnamon, spices, vanilla and tonka coming out more. Smells amazing though! I did one spray on my arm! It projected pretty good and lasted around 7 hours. It gives a gourmand vibe, but when I was near food this smells 100% gourmand. When I toasted a bagel the mixture of the bagel and Oajan legit smelled like a cinnamon roll. Had something similar happen when I wore Axe Dark Temptation to work(I worked in a kitchen). All I smelled was French Toast around me. This takes the crown as my favorite fragrance from spicebomb. Couldnt stop smelling my arm! Smells like a higher quality 1 Million Prive! <br />
<br />
Smell 10/10<br />
Longevity 7/10<br />
Projection 7/10<br />
Price 2/10<br />
Overall 6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2230634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2230634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229752" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="antongl97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1916194"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1916194.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="antongl97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Ambra-Calabria-30568.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30568.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambra Calabria"title="Ambra Calabria"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1916194">antongl97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 03:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I rarely ever leave negative reviews on here but with oajan I just can't help myself. Unsure if there's been a reformulation to this or that I'm just missing something. To my nose this is straight up cinnamon and nothing else. Look, it doesn't smell bad and if you LOVE cinnamon this might be for you. The note breakdown of this thing is way more complex than it smells. I'm really not getting any sweetness and it most definitely does NOT smell like an apple pie. The lack of complexity for this so called "gourmand" at the price point it's valued at is a robbery. This is not quality for money in my opinion. Tried to like it but it just doesn't do anything for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2229752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2229752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its particularly rich and warm on the opening, but it goes a bit soapy/powdery on the dry down to my nose. Reminiscent of Angles Share (which came out after Oajan) with the apple pie, but not the same particularly in the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2222993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2222993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; BUT, i don`t like it, it is way too much spice and sweetness. Projects like a demon in the first hour, and works great for at least 5-6 hours. Must try for a fall/winter NIGHT time only. <br />
<br />
Smell: 7/10<br />
Performance: 8.5/10<br />
Price: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2220492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2220492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219673" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LostSock"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1500461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LostSock" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-pour-Homme-2003-691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"title="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461">LostSock</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this yesterday with a purchase of Cherry Smoke by TF. Second time I've had a sample of it now - way too sweet for me, reminds me of a Mr. Kipling apple pie and I don't  really want to smell like a cheap mass produced pie. Sprayed it on my left hand and it was gone within an hour. Made me think it was a dupe it was so poor performance wise. <br />
<br />
The notes I got from the bottle match the notes on here though, and I've yet to come across a dupe of this anywhere. Dua probably do one, but I don't/won't buy anything from Dua.<br />
<br />
Definitely leans feminine, just a bit too limp wristed for a man, think Angels Share, without any real wow factor to make up for the fact it smells like a pie or ice cream. Women will likely love this on a man so if that's why you wear frags then go for it - I wear scents for me though, and this is just too Body Shop meets Lush meets Willy Wonka. Sickly sweet with no body.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2219673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2219673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216850" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="flyasfuxk2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184455"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2184455.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="flyasfuxk2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2184455">flyasfuxk2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 15:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the best cozy sort of fragrance i've ever smelt, after smelling it I feel like i'm sipping hot cocoa in an abandoned ski lodge with a fire running. The smell is great as I love sweet fragrances, the only 2 downsides I can see to this are the price and versatility. This is pretty strictly a winter smell, can get away with it in late fall. <br />
<br />
Edit: Eventually you'll realize there's not really a time and place to smell like a fresh cinnamon roll. It is extremely pleasant to smell, but I'm not sure if I'd want to continue wearing it since its such an interesting smell, Pulling up to school or work smelling like a mall cinnabon spot feels pretty weird.<br />
<br />
<br />
Smell:9.5/10<br />
Versatility: 2/10<br />
Price: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2216850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2216850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213316" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bingo30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1851398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bingo30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213316ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213316" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); <br />
Beautiful sweet gourmand. I would call it unisex but it is possibly feminine leaning to some tastes.<br />
<br />
Cinnamon, a lot of honey, floral apple sludge, and subtle nutmeg/tobbaco/tonka touches. Best in very cold weather it would be cloying otherwise. The price is still ridiculous.<br />
<br />
8.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2213316"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2213316#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2210714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2210714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209117" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2209117" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sivertelton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099238"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sivertelton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2209117ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2209117" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099238">Sivertelton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-05">07/05/24 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Havent heard anyone speak of this, but the drydown is extremely similar to guerlain lhomme ideal EDP (which used to be my all time favourite). The PDM gives you vanilla instead of cherry, and the pdm does evolve and loses some of its similarities, but they are very close so i would recommend the guerlain as a cheaper alternative. <br />
Regardless this is one of the best scents ive personally smelled. For me this is everything i want in a fragrance, couldnt recommend it more if you do have the means, if not guerlain offers a similar smell for half the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2209117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2209117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its nice but cinnamon is very prominent in the opening, almost powdery and cloyingly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2207786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2207786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207667" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karinavi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karinavi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2207667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2207667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898071">karinavi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 23:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>while clearly emulating hermes' ambre narguille, oajan is even dryer and notably less complex in its blend of spices. that said, as a vanilla lover, the simplicity works in its favor. the drydown leaves a soft, smooth vanilla base with just a hint of cinnamon remaining. it really is delicious and one of the best from pdm, i would even say it isn't necessarily redundant to own oajan, ambre narguille, and angels' share.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2207667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2207667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2207650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This scent is kinda hard to wear, not a big fan but no hate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2207057"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2207057#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202365" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199462" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="illtehbeast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1864415.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="illtehbeast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Hibiscus-Mahajad-69069.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69069.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hibiscus Mahajd"title="Hibiscus Mahajd"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199462ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199462" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864415">illtehbeast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 16:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is angels share done better, mind you there is no booze note, so there is a clear distinction. I find that the booze note takes a way a lot of the smoothness which is what I love about Oajan so much. It opens really quite spicy (cinnamon) and over its progression loses the spice, and the tonka bean and vanilla take over. I would compare the dry down to khamrah (in a sense) but FAR less synthetic, and incredibly smooth. Truly an amazing winter fragrance, however, I really think this is viable in quite cold weather. I'm talking late fall and winter, so not much versatility there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2199462"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2199462#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193976" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="A-Minor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2171240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="A-Minor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171240">A-Minor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Carlisle, Layton Exclusif, and Altair. This was my old top 3, this is wrong. Oajan is by far the best sweet fragrance pdm has. Rich, deep, cinnamon apple pie. Great performance 12+ hours on my skin with strong projection for the first couple of hours. then for another 6 hours it holds a good arms length, then moves down to a skin scent for the rest of the time. 12/10 Probably the best pdm imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; warm spicy, smells more like an apple pie than angel's share, and it is more warm-spicy without that booze note, which is the main difference between the two</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2192720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2192720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192142" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192142" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandmanMrBandman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandmanMrBandman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-56358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192142ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192142" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102">BandmanMrBandman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 12:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love on first sniff its so sweet but like yummy sweet without ever being too cloying honestly wished it lasted longer than the first hour. Amber doused in sweet honey and warm cinnamon and Tonka bean in the background is like the perfect level of sweetness and then in the dry down the vanilla really shines and becomes more basalmic I think from the benzoin, in total only lasts around 4-5 hours on me but is absolutely addicting Im sad I already used up my decant will be buying a bottle on sale.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
