align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2187642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2187642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184444" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184444" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ParfumGatekeeper"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1969077"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1969077.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ParfumGatekeeper" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Seahorse-69386.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69386.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Seahorse"title="Seahorse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184444ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184444" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1969077">ParfumGatekeeper</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 20:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My honest review on this is at first when i smelt the bottle I thought it smelt like cinnamon rolls and that was it. Fast forward 3 months I had been thinking about how damn that shit smelled like a fire ass cinnamon roll and once I saw it in stock for 185 on aura I decided to snap call it. And heres my thoughts off the rip it is a super strong cinnamon note that overtakes the dark sweet spicyness you get about 30 minutes later but once you get to that point the rest is heaven, its like Eros flame in the sense that it becomes a magical scent once it sits for 30 minutes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2184444"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2184444#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2183949" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2183949" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="0xrafae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1544521"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1544521.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="0xrafae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2183949ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2183949" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1544521">0xrafae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>POV from the PdM lab, featuring the senior perfumer (SP) and junior perfumer (JP):<br />
<br />
JP: How about we add some vanilla, sugar, and honey to this coconut water dissolved in maple syrup?<br />
SP: That sounds good, but remember the aspartame, marshmallow, and xylitol. We can't let it be too bitter!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2183949"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2183949#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180100" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ke3ke3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ke3ke3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Iris-Malikhan-62617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Malikhn"title="Iris Malikhn"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926">ke3ke3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 11:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On first spray, it is very metallic. Perhaps that is the osmanthus, I'm not sure as that is not a note I am familiar with. I don't hate it, it's just a bit off for me. However, it is such a brief experience, it's definitely not something that off puts me from the fragrance. I disagree that this smells like a warm apple pie, I am not sure where everyone is getting the apple? I'm not pleased by that nor am I upset by it, I just don't follow the comparison. Whoever said it makes them smell like a fornication-worthy cinnamon roll, I think they pretty much nailed it. I get the cinnamon, honey, I certainly would agree that it smells of a fresh baked pastry... Like I said, my nose just does not detect the apple.<br />
<br />
I blind bought this fragrance as I saw it available for a very good price, and ordered a decant to test it JUST in case, so I could sample it before opening the box (at which point I could not return). Right now, I am very on the fence about whether to keep it or return it. I love Parfums de Marly, and I am a big fangirl of the house. I recently picked up Althair, which I loved so much that I felt pretty safe just sending it on Oajan as well. It's not that I don't think it smells good, it does, it smells wonderful. But does it smell... does the fragrance evoke the emotions to justify the price? I don't know. I don't think so. I want to think so, I really do, I love PDM and I hate returns, I've got a lot of reasons to let it slide.. but I'm really just not sure that I can. If I had paid full price for this, I am absolutely certain I would be upset. But I got it for about half price... and still, not sure if it's worth it to me to hang onto. To clarify, I am testing the decant, from a reputable decanter, so there is no question of the authenticity of the sample. I am surprised at the strength of this fragrance, it is far far less strong than I expected. I've already had to re-apply it twice today, and I've only been working for 4 hours. Noting that I do not overspray, but I also don't prefer to have to re-apply.<br />
<br />
It does smell good. It absolutely does smell good. For me it's just coming down to the value proposition. I don't find this fragrance to be incredibly unique, nor do I find it to be notably complex. It's a nice fragrance. It is a nice smelling fragrance in a stunning bottle. However, to me it is a designer-leaning niche fragrance. I am not typically a gourmand person, so perhaps I'm just put off by paying such a high price for something I could buy at the grocery store for a few bucks and stick in the oven... can I make bakhoor cinnamon roles a thing? I kid. Anywho, this almost feels like something I'd expect to find from an indie house, to be honest. Isn't a slight, indie perfumeries can produce some incredible fragrances, just not what I am wanting when I purchase something niche. I think this is a return for me. <br />
<br />
Also worth noting, I do not perceive this to be masculine. Not feminine, either, but to me it is perfectly unisex. One of the most unisex unisex perfumes I've encountered! If I were to hang onto it, I would only wear it during holidays. Like, I would wear it twice a year at Thanksgiving and Christmas. Perhaps the month of December.. limited use for my preferences!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2180100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2180100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180001" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180001" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jlog23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555933.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jlog23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180001ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180001" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); Cant wait to rock this in the colder months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2180001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2180001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177914" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Oh god, its glorious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2176964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2176964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175101" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Layton, Pegasus, and Herod are miles ahead of this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2173013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2173013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2171791" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Larabella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/44185"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.44185.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Larabella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal 33"title="Santal 33"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2171791ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2171791" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/44185">Larabella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 16:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't get apple pie or strong spice. For me, marzipan and ambergris take centre stage and supporting notes blend to perfection. There's nothing harsh or vyying for individual attention. Feels warm, comforting and mystical. More sweet than spicy but not overly so. There's a powdery note that's weaving everything together without being sharp or cloying. I have this sprayed on one wrist and Angel's Share on the other. The latter has a cooler undertone(?) and more booze and tobacco. Both are pleasant but I think Oajan is more unique.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2171791"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2171791#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169779" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Oh my god, this is the best cologne that I have smelt in a minute. I blind bought this cologne after reading some amazing comments and reviews on Oajan, and oh boy it did not upset me one bit. This cologne smells like a warm and spicy apple pie, perfect for the winter days. I am so pleased with how well this cologne performs and the longevity (lasts 10+ hours on my skin). I get 3-5 compliments when ever I am wearing Oajan, and even my ex girlfriend came crawling back wanting to get back with me. Now that's something! I had the choice between blind buying Oajan or Greenly, but Oajan was just better, and I was proved correct. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152768" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Prunel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Prunel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Opus-XII-Rose-Incense-74282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opus XII  Rose Incense"title="Opus XII  Rose Incense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223">Prunel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 11:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The similarities with Angel's Share, on my skin, are undeniable. It absolutely shares the same DNA. But I think this smells better, smoother. AS is more ... "rough". But sadly this doesn't have the same performance as Angel's Share. I feel like this should be more potent. Disapointing performance sadly, especially for the price. After trying quite a few PDM, I really struggle to understand the hype. The quality isn't there for the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2152768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2152768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152587" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Especially Oajan, Haltane, Carlisle and Percival fall into the weaker ones when it comes to newer batches?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2149093"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2149093#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2122347">FelixCentre</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 14:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I we.t to my local perfume shop and I wanted to smell Kilians Angel Share but they didn't have it so the seller recommended PdM Oajan instead, he thought it smelled better to a better price so I tried it.<br />
<br />
Got hooked instantly and this is the first PdM perfume I ever smellt.<br />
<br />
I wanted to have it immediately, but I didn't want a full bottle so I order a 10 ml split from a perfume group at Facebook, the sample I got was from older batch with the golden hat.<br />
<br />
The cinnamon smell is lovely and I could wear this all year round , BUT I don't know if it's the because of the warmer weather but I don't think Its lasts so long and the sillety isn't wow, my girlfriend didn't notice anything and I took 2 sprays on the neck.<br />
Maybe it's better in the cold but still great unique smell!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2146754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2146754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144820" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656862">dokei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 15:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just smelled an older batch. It seems like the new bottles are pretty meh when against the old ones. Basically the testers are older batches and they hook you in like that. But the perfume has been reformulated and simplified. If you find an older batch and are into the scent profile id suggest you get it. But newer ones are just not worth it at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2144820"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2144820#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138728" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="timsmellsg00d"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="timsmellsg00d" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Satin-Mood-30352.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30352.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Satin Mood"title="Oud Satin Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138728ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138728" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830196">timsmellsg00d</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-28">04/28/24 00:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The most amazing apple pie caught in a bottle. It will make you float into the air like a cartoon with its aroma. I get a lot of similarities with this to Angel's Share which is not a bad thing as it is a masterpiece of a fragrance. To my nose it is slightly less gourmand but still an amazing sweet winter fragrance and marginally cheaper than Angel's Share. I am also in love with the new gold cap bottle.<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Performance: 10/10<br />
Price: 7.5/10<br />
Overall: 8.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2138728"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2138728#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138717" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So it opens up with ALOT of cinnamon and a bit of honey and then it stays like that for 5 hours and then it...skips the middle notes?? and goes straight to what i would guess is patchouli and vanilla and stays like that until u cant smell it no more<br />
<br />

f*cking masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2138717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2138717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138629" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Completely unisex, and the ladies love this. My girlfriend practically begs me to wear this whenever we're going out. <br />
<br />
Powdery, cinnamon, spices, honey, vanilla, and tonka. It really does smell like apple pie, but it's somehow not cloyingly sweet. You WANT to keep smelling it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2138629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2138629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130860" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dareenx12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1973367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dareenx12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130860ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130860" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1973367">Dareenx12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 15:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweetness bomb. To my nose this smells like a honey covered cinnamon pie, with heavy notes of vanilla and cinnamon making this a very gourmand fragrance. I do get spices in the dry down as well. This fragrance is interesting due to being heavily cold weather based. I cannot really think of a summer day when I could wear this tbh. If you love gourmand, you will at least like this fragrance. The performance is amazing too. Longevity can range from 10-15 hours and projection is very good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2130860"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2130860#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128834" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128834" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Airborne Armadillo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258878"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258878.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Airborne Armadillo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Camel-47334.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47334.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Camel"title="Camel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128834ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128834" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258878">Airborne Armadillo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 15:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked this enough to buy it after I used up a sample, but after more experience with it it turns out to be too persistently sweet for my taste. Something also seems somehow soapy at times which is very dissonant to the very sweet spicy gourmand aspects. I only see three other reviewers calling out soap so I am obviously in the minority here. Wasn't a love so I sold it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2128834"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2128834#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128036" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gaboich"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984964"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gaboich" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oajan"title="Oajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984964">Gaboich</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 23:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an upgrade from every other pdm but it still has not hit the top.<br />
<br />
Its pretty good but its overpriced like every other pdm<br />
<br />
<br />
Update: Best fragrance of all time. Its quite linear for me but i love the opening so its not a problem for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2128036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2128036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124809" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112916" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wondervalley666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="wondervalley666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salum-Parfums/Cocoyster-90755.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90755.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cocoyster"title="Cocoyster"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112916ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112916" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1461605">wondervalley666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get a cinnamon honey booze from this. Very nice. Not as masculine as I expected. I feel like I could pull this off as a woman. Now the real debate is whether I need this considering I already own a couple of christmas scents. Probably not, but I want it anyway! Fragrance addiction is truly a curse. <br />
<br />
I wonder about the comments here talking about poor performance in newer formulations-are you people buying directly from legit retailers? Because eBay and the like are FLOODED with super realistic looking fake PDMs that have valid batch codes (not hard to fake) and have been for years now. Ive never heard of any PDM selling for $100, except for the fake ones on eBay which are everywhere. If youre complaining about quality and performance and you bought a cheap bottle on eBay, you arent reviewing the real scent, youre reviewing a counterfeit knockoff that was sold for $10 wholesale so of course its not going to be as good as the real thing</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2112916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2112916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112702" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107804" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Venussweden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1752733"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Venussweden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Skin-35244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Skin"title="Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107804ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107804" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1752733">Venussweden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-29">03/29/24 06:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love love love this perfume. Perfect for colder months when you want something gourmandish but very unisex, grown up. I get apple note if I spray him on clothes and go outdoors. Indoors and on skin theres no apple to me If youre a guy, this during date, pretty sure the date will be very intimate and physical . Hes very inviting </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2107804"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2107804#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The opening is so good in this, but the drydown smells much too similar to before-mentioned on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2105162"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2105162#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104725" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104725" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sauvage77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766666"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sauvage77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Layton-39314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Layton"title="Layton"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104725ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104725" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766666">Sauvage77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just tried it and had a sample today.Well,i think its as good as it gets for me.Probably the best smelling winter fragrance i have ever smelled.What a masterpiece,there is just nothing bad about it.Longevity and projection are top notch.It has a strong honey note and a bit boozines and it manages to be both sweet and classy.I dont think its as sweet as people say it is.Its extremely nice to smell and intoxicating and also classy and perfect for winter and autumn cold weather.You could pull it off on cold spring nights or days too but definetely not for summer for me.This is the GOAT of fragrances for me and im gonna glaze it forever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2104725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2104725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ManicMonkey84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252174"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1252174.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ManicMonkey84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Indigo-26845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Indigo"title="Indigo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252174">ManicMonkey84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 08:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not so much a gourmand as it is "gourmand-esque", evoking the sensation of being near a spiced, honey-forward confection warming up in the oven but you're far away enough where it's not giving you a headache. Honey, vanilla, and tonka bean are generally notes which skew saccharine for me, but I like how the spikey cinnamon counterbalances the sweetness and gives the scent a moreish quality. I totally get the Naxos comparison, but for me Oajan feels less dimensional. Sillage is strong but not overpowering, and longevity is first-class but I suppose that's to be expected for the PdM price-tag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2100609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2100609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2099213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042296">Ordningsvakt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 03:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I personally can't find the apple pie in this. Its great and lasts very long, the top notes gives me apple cider mixed with a pinch of cinnamon which I love, but after 30 minutes I smell just cinnamon/warm spice/vanilla without the sweetness of apple pies I'm familiar with. Don't recommend for blind buying, but overall one of the best winter fragrances I have tested</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2099213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2099213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094311" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sean25"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1930641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sean25" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Absinthe-Boreale-53873.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53873.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absinthe Borale"title="Absinthe Borale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930641">Sean25</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 07:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had a bottle of the old formulation and sold it and replaced it with angel's share. Opens with cinnamon, honey and vanilla, very gourmand, and can come off as overbearingly sweet, which I find the cognac in angel's share cuts through. The dry down is when the benzoin comes out, other than that I don't notice any major changes. <br />
<br />
performance is great, 5 hours sillage, and 10 hours longevity which is more than enough for the occasions this fit for. I find price value to be great. However, the new juice uses lesser quality ingredients and has way worse performance as pdm is consumed by its own greed. 8/10 for old formulation, 6/10 for the new one. IMHO just get angel's share</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2094311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2094311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A beautiful cinnamon bun with subtle hints of apple</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2092453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2092453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091885" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jordannmessner"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2015343"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jordannmessner" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2015343">jordannmessner</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 20:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just bought a 95%-filled 125ml bottle (gold cap) for $100.  While this was on my buying list, I wasn't planning on buying this any time soon, but the deal came up, and it was too good to pass.  Agree with @Mogge_wap .   This is THE Christmas fragrance.  It perfectly captures the essence of it.  Smells like a professional baker submitted their well-kept secret recipe apple pie with all the right spices in a baking contest.  Can be worn in fall and winter.  While it could be worn in the spring, it is a very thematic fragrance and would stick out due to that.  Sillage and duration are fairly beast mode.  Has similarities to Angel's Share, but I prefer this over AS.  Leans slightly masculine, but anyone can wear this.  Best for a date night, but it can be pulled off during the day as well.  If worn at work, I'd make sure you have no important meetings.  If you do, I'd wear something more serious and toned down.  But it should be fine for normal office days.  For what it is, I couldn't imagine it smelling better or being improved upon.<br />
<br />
Fragrance: 10/10<br />
Sillage: 8/10<br />
Duration: 9/10<br />
<br />
Overall: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2091885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2091885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091431" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I mean it smells like sweet apple pie, but somehow they managed to make it smell sexy, classy, and boozy. After trying it at a store nearby, the price point just flew over my head and I bought it straight away. Theres a reason for the 4.5/5 reviews here out of over 3.5k people.<br />
<br />
Only downsides I could think of are the price point and mid range versatility. But for me that doesnt matter, so its a perfect 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2091093"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2091093#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2083762" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Velvet-Raven"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1652635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1652635.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Velvet-Raven" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2083762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2083762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); I will purchase this one some day, the price is quite high but this is the ultimate winter fragrance, I dont think that any other fragrance could do better than this in terms of suiting the essence of winter and the holiday season. It feels like a warm hug from an attractive man, even tho its totally unisex. Im normally not a gourmand lover and I prefer fresh scents but this won my heart the moment I used it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2083762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2083762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2082802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2082802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2080902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2080902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vicky Medrano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674997"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1674997.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vicky Medrano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2080902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2080902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674997">Vicky Medrano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-03">03/03/24 09:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this is a much better blended Angel's Share. The similarity is about 65% I would say. Angels' shares is more woody and smoky, and has an acid tone. I don't get an acid tone in here at all. I really like it. I'd say is unisex leaning masculine but I'd totally use it. This is boozy apple, sweet, cinnamon, woody, powdery. I get a little bit of oud, but is not listed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2080902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2080902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2075100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2075100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2075100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2074924" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JeremeyFRAGRANCEGOAT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JeremeyFRAGRANCEGOAT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Grand-Soir-40816.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40816.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grand Soir"title="Grand Soir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2074924ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2074924" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014046">JeremeyFRAGRANCEGOAT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first smelled this fragrance I didn't enjoy the top notes. It was too sweet for my liking, but this fragrance grew on me like crazy. I got myself a sample and thought the way it smelled and lasted on my skin was amazing. To me it was perfect for the fall and winter temperatures. To me it smells like a freshly baked apple pie. But for me it is too expensive for the silage and mediocre projection. I think this fragrance is a bad blind buy. To me I could never spend this much on a fragrance that doesn't perform like it should at this price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2074924"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2074924#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071450" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071450" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stej1983"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985667"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stej1983" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aaron-Terence-Hughes/Daddy-83706.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83706.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Daddy"title="Daddy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);
