Please treat yourself to 30ml of Aaron Terrance Hughes - Addicted. You will not look back.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2071450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2071450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071122" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dy7no"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1975704"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dy7no" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071122ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071122" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1975704">Dy7no</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 00:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect warm and sweet gourmand fragrance. One of my favourite PDM. Smells like a less boozy but warmer Angel's Share. The amber note is really dominant so is the vanilla. They combine into a delicious apple pie. Amazing date night and winter fragrance. Only problem that I have is the longevity and the silliage. It doesn't perform well on my skin. Still an amazing perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2071122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2071122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I hope to one day save up the money for a full bottle. I won't even bother looking at clones because I know that it won't replicate this to it's beauty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2066895"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2066895#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066086" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sanad001"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898316"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sanad001" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066086ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066086" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898316">Sanad001</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, so this is an amazing fragrance. I think I posted a review on this on my old account saying I hate it; oh, but how much I love it now. To put it into simpler words, it is a mesmerizing, deep, and beastly mix of spices, honey, cinnamon, Tonka, and amber. It has amazing longevity and performance and smells great. I also want to say another thing. Please, and I mean PLEASE, layer this with Althair (of course, if you have it). Two sprays of Oajan, three sprays of Althair. This smells fucking amazing. Probably the best thing I have every smelled, no exaggeration. In the start, Oajan will definitely be overpowering, but give it somewhere between 15-30 minutes, and this will turn out SEXY. AS. HELL. A deep, powdery, vanilla with a beautiful amber/honey undertone. The cinnamon is also somewhere in there. Please give this out a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2066086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2066086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064939" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Floggnawz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996150"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Floggnawz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064939ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064939" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996150">Floggnawz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 04:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This bad boy gives me the shakes my top tier</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2064939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2064939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2060717" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060717" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mango0951"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1901369.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mango0951" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060717ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060717" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901369">Mango0951</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-13">02/13/24 01:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oajan Parfums de Marly is a fantastic fragrance that truly stands out. It features a unique and appealing blend of notes that creates a warm and inviting olfactory experience.<br />
<br />
The fragrance opens with a sweet and spicy combination of honey, cinnamon, and vanilla. This opening is delicate and attention-grabbing. As it develops, the scent reveals a rich and full-bodied tobacco note, imparting a warm and sensual feeling.<br />
<br />
What really sets Oajan Parfums de Marly apart from other fragrances is its ability to be both sweet and spicy at the same time. It strikes a perfect balance between the different notes, resulting in a scent that is appealing and pleasant to wear.<br />
<br />
The longevity of Oajan Parfums de Marly is also impressive. It lasts a long time on the skin and leaves a lasting impression. The fragrance is also quite potent, so only a small amount is needed to achieve the desired effect.<br />
<br />
Many perfume enthusiasts have given positive reviews of Oajan Parfums de Marly, describing it as a unique and luxurious fragrance that stands out from the crowd. If you are looking for a scent that is both sweet, spicy, and sensual, Oajan Parfums de Marly is definitely worth trying. Highly recommended!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2060717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2060717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059950" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059950" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OwlFactory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1872873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OwlFactory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059950ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059950" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872873">OwlFactory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-12">02/12/24 08:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had a peculiar experience with my sample of Oajan. PDM sent it to me after a Herod purchase. When it first arrived, it was a heavy top note of smoky incense, and nothing much else. I put it away for a couple months and reapplied it, only to discover it now smells like a bottle of cabernet that has been opened for 3 days. After a few minutes, it shifts back into the incense smell. What an odd fragrance. I wouldn't say it's bad, it's just unusual. <br />
<br />
For those saying it reminds them of Naxos or Angel's Share, I couldn't disagree more. I own both of those fragrances and they're on my Top-5 Most Frequently Worn list. The sample I have of Oajan doesn't smell anything like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2059950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2059950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058008" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MuskyBro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1559494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MuskyBro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carlisle"title="Carlisle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058008ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058008" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559494">MuskyBro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 07:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is a mix of Naxos and Angels Share for me. It smells better than both. Another banger from PDM.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2058008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2058008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Feminine. Develops into a bitter, dry spicey aroma that gets stuck in your throat, in a bad way. Nothing special - way overpriced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2056893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2056893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2056278" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fubar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995890"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1995890.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fubar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2056278ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2056278" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); Very reminiscent of Angel's share, with maybe more tonka/honey notes instead of less apple-y notes. <br />
Regardless, this fragrance smells GREAT. I wouldn't imagine this as a fragrance people can hate easily. <br />
Sadly, the high price point makes this a hard purchase. Also, the longevity isn't the BEST, but the sillage is definitely up there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2056278"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2056278#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051646" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1576377">lanabroz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 00:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I came to the shop to buy a perfume for a male friend and ended up buying this beauty for myself.<br />
It was love on a first sniff.<br />
This is beautiful, intoxicating, gourmand perfume, PERFECTLY SUITABLE FOR WOMEN! <br />
Honey is predominant, then cinnamon and tonka, with an ambery undertone. <br />
<br />
Men don't get offended, but I personally wouldn't want my man to smell this sweet, so I invite women to get their hands on this gem. <br />
<br />
It's sweet and cosy but at the same time it has a strong character, suitable for a lady boss. <br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10<br />
Longevity 8/10<br />
Projection 7/10<br />
<br />
I layer it with Bianco Latte and Ambre Eccentrico and it works well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2051646"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2051646#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2047006" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BowTieFragGuy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1994817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BowTieFragGuy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2047006ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2047006" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1994817">BowTieFragGuy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 13:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My fav fragrance of all time. The cinnamon is so nice mixed with the honey. Totally worth every penny!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2047006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2047006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046371" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046371" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Harmonist/Hypnotizing-Fire-36700.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36700.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotizing Fire"title="Hypnotizing Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046371ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046371" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538">Kyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 23:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is what I expected and wanted Layton to be. <br />
<br />
This does actually smell exactly like a cinnamon heavy apple pie, its such a gourmand and warm fragrance perfect for those snowy winter days. <br />
Compared to Layton, this is superior if youre looking for that apple pie smell. Layton is heavy on lavender and cardamom, a combination that made it smell old school to my nose, sure, it did resemble an apple pie as well, but one that you were eating at your grandfather's house back in the 90's, theres a note in there that ruins the apple pie feel to me and makes it feel old and off, I believe its the lavender but Im not sure. <br />
<br />
With Oajan you get that apple pie goodness without any of those odd notes I was describing, if you like me wanted to like Layton but couldnt, give this one a try, because at least to me: <br />
<br />
This scratches the itch that Layton and Angels Share created that they couldnt live to relief.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2046371"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2046371#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2043291" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Danio boguslawski"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1989401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1989401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Danio boguslawski" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2043291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2043291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); Very good longevity and beautiful Sweet cinnamon and honey opening that dries down to a tonka bean, vanilla and cinnamon scent. Smells like a cinnamon cookie but in a good way. Beautiful scent that flows and is crafted perfectly. Very addictive and a good people pleaser/ complement magnet. <br />
My favortie from The PDM's i tried.<br />
Longevity: 9/10<br />
Sillage: 9/10<br />
Scent: 9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2043291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2043291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042259" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2039134" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Samurai23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1536719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Samurai23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2039134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2039134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536719">Samurai23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 22:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No, Oajan doesn't smell like Angels' Share. The honey note in Oajan is prominent and different from the praline-cognac sweetness in Angels' Share.<br />
That being said, Oajan is probably closer to Naxos thanks to the honey. I don't like honey,  so I wouldn't wear either of them, but they are both really nice fragrances. Oajan is definitely more masculine, Naxos smells more feminine to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2039134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2039134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2039013" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TWN2RBO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946489"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1946489.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TWN2RBO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Amber-Absolute-1821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Absolute"title="Amber Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2039013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2039013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946489">TWN2RBO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 18:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oajan is the male version of Angels Share. Angels share is 100% not unisex, its a gorgeous scent made for a woman. Oajan is for the men who love that scent and want to wear it,  its what Angels Share could have been if it was a real unisex fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2039013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2039013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037393" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ash0011"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1569938"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ash0011" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037393ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037393" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1569938">ash0011</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First off I would like to say the performance of this fragrance is excellent. Lasts all day. I went quite heavy on the sprays and could smell it all day, which is unusual as I didn't go nose blind to it. It is a rich gourmand, rich in cinnamon and a nice bit of tang to it. I enjoyed the smell but although its a smell I enjoy in small doses, I don't really think I would like to smell like this too much of the time. If you are into rich cinnamon-heavy gourmand scents I would highly recommend this, as the performance is truly great and the smell is one of quality. However not for me, just not really my taste, but can understand the appeal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2037393"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2037393#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036443" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wj26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892274"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="wj26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Bad-Boy-Extreme-78562.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78562.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bad Boy Extreme"title="Bad Boy Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); <br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2036443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2036443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036366" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Youngkilla3000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499531"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Youngkilla3000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499531">Youngkilla3000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-20">01/20/24 04:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No this doesn't smells like Angel Share, maybe in the same ballpark/dna but, this has more emphasis on the honey and it's less spicy comparing to Angel Share. This is WAY stronger than Angel Share too, easily 12 hours minimum, careful with the spray. This isn't a very "gourmand" fragrance for me because it still on the spicier side comparing to other gourmand fragrance but, if you like spicy honey fragrance, you can blind buy this and won't regret it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2036366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2036366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034142" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2034142" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="edmnd47"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710385"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1710385.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="edmnd47" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2034142ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2034142" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710385">edmnd47</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-17">01/17/24 19:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oajan is one of the best gourmand scents on the market. It opens up with a blast of honey, cinnamon and vanilla. Super warm and cozy, apple pie, Christmas vibes. It is a pretty heavy scent that does fill up the whole room if thats what you are looking for. On my skin it does last above 12hrs with massive projection. I can see similarity with Angels Share, but Oajan is less boozy and more syrupy sweet. <br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10<br />
Projection 10/10<br />
Sillage 10/10<br />
Longevity 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2034142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2034142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2031172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sillage: Good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2028697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2028697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
