padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1959177">Xaviz89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Am I the only one who feels like it just ends up with just a cola smell at the end? The tonka bean stands out extremely too much for me during the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2020664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2020664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019356" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lidor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lidor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Le-Parfum-74915.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74915.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"title="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960">lidor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 17:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, complex and very rich.<br />
<br />
Scent:9.5<br />
Projection/Longevity:8.5<br />
Uniqueness:9<br />
quality:10<br />
Value for money:ok<br />
<br />
Overall:9.5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2019356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2019356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018055" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zdekidoktor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955266"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zdekidoktor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018055ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018055" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955266">Zdekidoktor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 13:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this scent! Smells like Christmas in a bottle. I believe it's a bit overpriced but still I believe it's worth it! Absolutely recommend it to people who like warm and cozy scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2018055"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2018055#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017794" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 08:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#512 in my "Tour de Fragrance" <br />
<br />
Parfums de Marley's "Oajan" is the scent of old-fashioned sanded cinnamon balls. I loved them as a kid, but I don't want to smell them or smell like them all day long.  This is certainly not cherry-forward Attar Khaltat Night. With Kilian's Angel's share, and the Angel's Share clone Khamrah, the cinnamon is not sharp and overwhelming as it is with this scent. I think the cinnamon projection is  too much for the office unless you want your office to smell like a Cinnabon. (As I vaguely remember Paco Rabanne 1 Million Prive the cinnamon was also not as pronounced, but may have just imagined that because I was focused on it's tobacco note.That was a scent discontinuation I did not mourn).<br />
<br />
For me Oajan is not versatile or wearable, or at least I can't come up with an appropriate venue for it. It's nice for five minutes then the cinnamon gets obnoxious. I think this would be weird in a club, and unless your date habitually chews "Big Red" chewing gum, I wouldn't expect it to be a hit on date night. It really projects, and while the cinnamon gets less sharp and annoying in an hour, hour and half, that's not fast enough for office wear, and by that point it smells identical to Khamrah, which is only $33 a bottle. So at a price of $315 this is an insane purchase. <br />
<br />
If you want vanilla and cinnamon where the cinnamon isn't overdone, and you don't want to break the bank, get the Lattafa Khamrah. If you want just a hint of cinnamon and you're willing to spend $200 and up on a scent like Oajan, then I urge you to try Xerjoff's amazing XJ1861 Naxos instead, which is a classier and more versatile scent. But do not blind buy Oajan or any $100+ fragrance without a test drive. Fragrances Line has decants.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2017794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2017794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017737" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BoyCalledHero"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1504552.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BoyCalledHero" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Arabian-Oud/Solid-Black-51308.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51308.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Solid Black"title="Solid Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017737ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017737" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504552">BoyCalledHero</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 07:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From reading the notes and other reviews, I was really excited to try this, however it turned out to be a bit of a disappointment. To me, this smells just like a Christmas Candle. Performance was also much worse than expected. I got around 3hrs out if it before I could no longer smell it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="2017737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=2017737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="21548" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1807158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1807158" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VickusDickusTheFourth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556756"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1556756.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="VickusDickusTheFourth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1807158ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1807158" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556756">VickusDickusTheFourth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-12">04/12/23 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was the first niche fragrance I bought and it was a blind buy. I watched every single review online for this stuff and every single video that made mention of it. This was probably the single most excited I ever was to buy something (more than a car or watch or literally anything). Seller said 3 business days shipping buy unfortunately that meant I had to wait until the next Monday as I ordered it mid week. The anticipation was killing me and the moment I saw the delivery truck come up my driveway I told the driver I loved them and they were a legend. She had no idea why I said this but found it funny and seemed to find joy from my excitement. She laughed and said thank you to me and told me to have a great day, and drove off. Went inside, opened the box, sprayed two sprays in the air and then sprayed one on my hand, took a whiff and immediately had a huge smile on my face and did a little shake, thats literally how happy I was. This was and still is the single greatest thing I've personally ever smelled in my life. This is my favorite fragrance ever with no second place.<br />
<br />
For the actual scent itself, it's actually very easy simple to explain the actual scent. Despite the descriptions simplicity, it remains a very complex one.<br />
<br />
Oajan is cinnamon apple pie topped with vanilla flavored whipped cream and warm honeyed milk on the side.<br />
<br />
It is an incredibly sweet dense gourmand that not a human being alive will dislike. There are 3 fragrances ive worn in my entire life that I have gotten at least one "unsolicited" compliment from a person every single time ive worn them, DG The One EDT/EDP, Lattafa Khamra, and Oajan. People say I smell nice with Khamra, people say I smell great with The One, people have an entirely different reaction all together with Oajan. You smell delicious, I want to eat you, how do you taste, something smells amazing, someones baking dessert, on and on and on and on. Im also a friendly outgoing person and strike up conversations with people even when I'm standing in line at the bank/grocery/etc so that makes compliments more abundant but even if I say nothing to nobody and I am in public its essentially guaranteed that someone will say something about my fragrance either to themselves/someone or directly to me.<br />
<br />
Performance<br />
On skin, until you shower and even after you will still catch whiffs.<br />
On clothes, literally weeks. Spray it on your jacket and its there until you wash it.<br />
I sprayed it on my leather pen case once and legitimately smelled it months later. I thought I was just imagining it for an hour one day until I remembered that I sprayed it on the case and was shocked and smiled.<br />
Fills up a room and leaves an incredible scent trail. Imagine cartoons where a grandma sits an apple pie on the window sill to cool off and people start levitating towards it, that is literally Oajans scent trail.<br />
<br />
This is unisex but honestly its much more appealing on/for men and probably the single most alluring male scent I have ever tried. If I was a gambler id say it smells masculine because of the patchouli even though you really cant pick it out of the composition. Its there but idk where. Somehow just makes it seem a little darker, and thats why its slightly more masculine in terms of allure and appeal.<br />
<br />
Not the most versatile because of how incredibly deep and rich it is, but in the cooler months this is king.<br />
<br />
The bottle is among the most beautiful I have ever seen. I've always found xerjoff to have the nicest presentation in the fragrance industry but Oajan is right up there. The bottle is much nicer in person and comes with a beautiful high gloss stand with a suede-like base.<br />
<br />
I recommend that everyone who is into fragrances should at the very least try this even if they dont blind buy it. If you like the scent profile as described above you will fall in love with this. It is, in my opinion, a safe blind buy.<br />
<br />
Well, I enjoyed sharing my experience and excitement with anyone who decided to read this.<br />
<br />
Have a great day everyone! =)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="1807158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=1807158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1675349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1675349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ricsil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596012"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1596012.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ricsil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Habdan-21550.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21550.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Habdan"title="Habdan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1675349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1675349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596012">ricsil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-27">10/27/22 07:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unpopular opinion: this is my Friday office fragrance. My best dry down so far. Masterpiece. <br />
<br />
Layton you can fall apart<br />
Carlisle, Herod break my heart<br />
Oh, Habdan doesn't even start<br />
It's Oajan, I'm in love</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="1675349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=1675349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1525673" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hintysuffix"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289226"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1289226.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hintysuffix" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Herms"title="Terre d'Herms"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1525673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1525673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289226">hintysuffix</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-18">03/18/22 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After getting Angels Share I had to try Oajan too, and this has quickly become my favorite darker cinnamon fragrance. It's intoxicating and just perfectly balanced between people-pleasing and niche in my opinion. It is slightly better than AS to my nose, but simply test both if you're unsure.<br />
Oajan is a 10/10 must-try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="1525673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=1525673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent722312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc722312" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Buysblind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/52178"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.52178.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Buysblind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/H24-65147.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65147.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="H24"title="H24"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma722312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd722312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/52178">Buysblind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-07-10">07/10/16 14:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Obviously, Oajan is very similar to Ambre Narguile. In fact, unless I had them side by side I wouldn't be able to tell you a single difference between the two. That said, this is the best Ambre Narguile clone (no denying it) available. Dolcelisir, while close, smells significantly cheaper, and Helium feels drier and a bit spicier (it's good, but different).  Oajan is more or less identical. In fact, it probably performs better, as Ambre Narguile is somewhat close to the skin, and Oajan gets out there a little more. As with most PdM fragrances, performance is very good. Aside from the superior performance, Oajan is significantly cheaper. You can find it for about $160 for a 125ml as opposed to Ambre Narguile which you're not going to find for less than $250 for a 100. While Oajan's MSRP is around $275, it's frequently discounted. So in my opinion, Oajan is the better buy. Several years ago, Ambre Narguile was the way to go as it was really the only one of its kind. Not anymore.  While PdM loses points for more or less creating a clone, I'll give them credit for doing a mighty fine job of it and for making Ambre Narguile available at a much cheaper price. Thumbs up. Did I mention I really like the way this smells?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="722312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=722312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1133189" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1133189" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="machavelii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1161060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="machavelii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Le-Lion-Eau-de-Parfum-61036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"title="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1133189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1133189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161060">machavelii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-10">01/10/20 23:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Once I was in the elevator and reached my floor. I opened up the door there was a kid and her mother, the kid looks at me and takes the biggest breath of air almost eats the air,  her moms says you really smell great!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="1133189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=1133189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="21548" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1482069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1482069" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UKVanilla2793"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1444111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="UKVanilla2793" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1482069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1482069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1444111">UKVanilla2793</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-13">01/13/22 02:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my final lesson in blind buying anything over 50 pounds , what a painful lesson. <br />
I am a woman , this is masculine not unisex. It is not pretty or deep warm vanilla smelling, it smells of sour cinnamon , it settles ok on the skin but who wants a 230 pound skin scent. It has terrible longevity and sillage , practically zero aftr the first hour. Extremely disappointed. <br />
Possibly ok for men but I don't even think it smells good, I'm not sure how anyone recommends or like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="1482069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=1482069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1686588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1686588" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mizur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mizur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Sensual-40563.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40563.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensual"title="Sensual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1686588ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1686588" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389">mizur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-12">11/12/22 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The note description must be missing Tobacco because thats all that I smell.<br />
<br />
I kind of get the apple pie reference, but more accurately this perfume smells like old fruity pipe tobacco mixed with something very sweet, not really recognizable as honey but very sweet indeed, and with some faint cinnamon on top.<br />
<br />
Definitely a cold weather scent, with a huge grandpa vibe.<br />
<br />
For me it was a blind buy, I love spices and I went for it now Im regretting this purchase because I really dont like the scent.<br />
<br />
And being honest this is not a bad perfume per se, in fact it might actually be quite good, it has decent performance and people seem to gravitate to the aroma, its just not for me.<br />
<br />
So, if you like grandpa vibe perfumes such as Tobacolor, you will love Oajan if not, stay away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="1686588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=1686588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1664804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Christmas Wreath Yankee Candle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="1664804"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=1664804#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1964552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1964552" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aleccsei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/503248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.503248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aleccsei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/APOM-Pour-Femme-6805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="APOM Pour Femme"title="APOM Pour Femme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1964552ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1964552" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1410599" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DookieShoes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266699"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1266699.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DookieShoes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1410599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1410599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266699">DookieShoes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-14">09/14/21 21:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Man this juice is painfully sweet and cloying, do not oversprayyou will choke yourself out and draw the wrong kind of attention; I learned the hard way. Relegate use to the coldest days and it will be more tempered. I can definitely see how gourmand lovers can adore this, but I personally find it hard to wear as it leans feminine and just flat out knocks me back with a sickening amount of sweetness where I generally dont mind sweet frags one bit. I strongly recommend sampling as it carries a PDM price tag and at least in my experience can be really divisive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="21548"comment_id="1410599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html?ccid=1410599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="21548" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="21548":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="21548" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

    <div class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 0.5em;"><span>Perfume Encyclopedia</span></div>
<div>Perfumes: <b>98,540</b><br/>
    Fragrance Reviews: <b>1,930,078</b><br/>
    Perfume lovers: <b>1,389,515</b><br/>
    <span style="
            background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 43.238709677419%, rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
